com.qtfx.lib.gui

Class FX

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.gui.FX

  • public class FX
extends java.lang.Object
    JavaFX utility functions, including:
    • Setting additional properties to any node in the user data.
    • Looking up for nodes and field controls.
    • Calculating text and components sizes.
    Nodes in this JavaFX development tools are sometimes expected to have properties in the user data. This class help manage those properties.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • getPropertyMap

        public static javafx.beans.property.SimpleMapProperty<java.lang.Object,javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<java.lang.Object>> getPropertyMap(javafx.scene.Node node)
        Return a property map set in the user data of the node. If the node has a user data of a non SimpleMapProperty class, an illegal argument exception is thrown.

        The usage of an observable map with observable object properties allows adding listeners either to the map or the properties.

        Parameters:
        node - The node.
        Returns:
        The property map.
